title: Mid-grade HOFers, raw HOFers, and all kinds of stuff for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Mid-grade HOFers, raw HOFers, and all kinds of stuff for sale
posts.post_content:
Please add $2 for shipping.  Insurance is available and up to you.

The 3 pictured are:

Waddell throwing (the one with back damage) $50
Brown portrait $70
Waddell throwing (clean back) $60

Some highlights of the rest are:

Waddell portrait Sov350 3
J. Collins 3.5
Willis Hindu portrait 1
Keeler batting 3.5
Clarke batting Hindu 1
and a bunch of others

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/e95collector/1_-for-sale-t206/[/url]
